title: Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore: Picnic
body: Picnic         Junior Ranger picnic   Covered picnic shelters with tables are located at the following locations along with modern restrooms. Cooking fires are permitted in the provided grills or an approved carry-in grill. An approved grill is a noncombustible container with an enclosed bottom and enclosed sides with a minimum depth of 2 inches.  Charcoal must be cooled and safely disposed of in a noncombustible container or removed from the area.   West Beach picnic shelters. Bailly Chellberg picnic shelters. Tremont picnic shelters. (Closed: August 3 - August 31, 2016)  Glenwood Dunes picnic shelters. Lake View Beach picnic shelters.    Picnic tables are also provided at Tolleston Dunes Overlook, Pinhook Bog parking lot and Porter Beach south parking lot. Cooking fires are not permitted.
